data.name: Parkitect - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
A separate download of the fully mastered soundtrack of the game as .mp3 and .wav files, if you want to listen to the games music outside the game itself.

To find the music files after installation right-click on Parkitect and select Properties -> Local Files -> Browse Local Files. They will be in the "Soundtrack" folder.

1. Welcome One, Welcome All 02:07
2. Mountain 05:43
3. Dandelion Chins 04:37
4. Any Which Way 03:18
5. Forever Fields 04:27
6. Clouds 04:08
7. Waving Pines 04:25
8. Green Green Grass 04:10
9. Water Meet Land 07:33
10. Careful Placement 04:03
11. We're All Here 02:01
12. Hey You Did It! (B-Side) 00:08
13. Atliope 00:54

18. Narwalliope 01:07
19. Black Lights 02:11
20. Nosfairatu 01:42
21. Barollerquoster 01:04
22. Big Ol Porch 01:51
23. Malliope 01:01
24. Popped Collars 02:08
25. Spoops! Did I Do That? 01:46
26. Swan Boat 02:05
27. Temple of Flume 01:32
28. These Pretzels... 01:09
29. Triliope 00:44
30. Whip Crack Hawk Screech 02:36
31. Winter Funderland 01:52
32. Kickstarter Trailer 01:04
33. Dandelion Chins (Acoustic)(B-Side) 04:21

data.short_description: Can't get enough of the music of Parkitect but don't want to keep the game running all the time to listen to it? Then this is what you need.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Dutch, French, Russian, Simplified Chinese
